chapters.title: Het Vermiste Fiets
chapters.description: Sanne's beloved blue bicycle has vanished from the park. As neighbors gossip and speculate, clues emerge that point to something more sinister than a simple theft.

scenarios.title: The Discovery
story_beats: Sanne arrives at park looking for her bicycle
Bicycle is not at the bike rack where she left it
Emma happens to be walking through the park
Sanne explains her bicycle is missing - describes it
Emma asks when Sanne last saw it
Sanne mentions it was here Wednesday morning
Emma suggests they ask around the neighborhood
Sanne feels worried - that bicycle was a gift from her father

clues.text_en: the bike rack in the park

quiz_focus: Where is Sanne?
What is missing?
What color is the bicycle?
When did Sanne last see her bicycle?
Who does Sanne talk to?
Why is the bicycle important to Sanne?
What does Emma suggest they do?

scenarios.title: The Gossip

goals: seem helpful without revealing too much

story_beats: Emma enters the caf√©, Hendrik is already there having coffee
Emma sits down and immediately brings up Sanne's missing bicycle
Hendrik is not surprised - says there have been other bicycles missing
Emma asks if he knows anything
Hendrik mentions he's seen someone at the bike rack late at night
Hendrik won't say who, but hints it's someone from the neighborhood
Emma presses for details
Hendrik says he needs to be sure before accusing anyone

clues.text_en: late at night at the bike rack

quiz_focus: Where are Emma and Hendrik?
What does Emma tell Hendrik about?
Is Sanne's bicycle the only one missing?
When has Hendrik seen suspicious activity?
Does Hendrik know who took the bicycles?
Why won't Hendrik say who he suspects?
How does Hendrik seem to feel about the situation?

scenarios.title: The Photograph

goals: figure out if she should report what she saw

story_beats: Lisa is in the park reviewing photographs on her camera
Pieter walks by and notices her looking concerned
Pieter asks if everything is okay
Lisa explains she was taking photos late Wednesday night
She saw something strange in one photo - someone at the bike rack with a bicycle
Pieter asks to see the photo
Lisa shows him - they can't see the person's face clearly but see a blue bicycle
Pieter mentions Sanne's blue bicycle went missing
Lisa realizes her photo might be important evidence

clues.text_nl: een blauwe fiets op de foto
clues.text_en: a blue bicycle in the photo

quiz_focus: Where does this conversation take place?
What is Lisa looking at?
When did Lisa take the photographs?
What did Lisa see in one of her photos?
Can they see the person's face in the photo?
What color bicycle is in the photo?
Why is the photo important?
What does Pieter remember about Sanne?

scenarios.title: The Connection
story_beats: Sanne comes to the bakery, Femke immediately asks about the bicycle
Sanne says still no sign of it
Femke mentions she heard from Emma about other missing bicycles
Femke also says someone took a photograph that might help
Sanne's hope rises - asks who has the photograph
Femke explains it's the photographer, Lisa, who lives nearby
Femke suggests Sanne should talk to her
Sanne feels encouraged - maybe there's a chance to find her bicycle

clues.text_nl: misschien kunnen we de fiets vinden
clues.text_en: maybe we can find the bicycle

quiz_focus: Where is Sanne?
Who does Sanne talk to?
Has Sanne found her bicycle yet?
What has Femke heard from Emma?
Who took a photograph that might help?
What does Femke suggest Sanne should do?
How does Sanne feel at the end of the conversation?

scenarios.title: The Confrontation
story_beats: Sanne and Hendrik arrive at the bicycle shop together
Jeroen seems nervous when they enter
Sanne directly asks if Jeroen has seen blue bicycles recently
Jeroen says he has many bicycles in the shop
Hendrik mentions he's seen Jeroen at the park late at night
Jeroen becomes defensive - says he was just checking his own bicycle
Sanne mentions the photograph from Lisa
Jeroen's face changes - he realizes he's caught
Jeroen breaks down - admits he's been stealing bicycles to sell parts
He explains he has debts and the shop is failing
Sanne's bicycle is in the back room
Jeroen apologizes profusely - says he'll return all the bicycles
Hendrik says they should call the police, but Sanne sees Jeroen is desperate
Sanne says they'll help him find another way, but he must stop

clues.text_nl: Jeroen was laat in het park
clues.text_en: Jeroen was late in the park

clues.text_nl: de fiets is in de achterkamer
clues.text_en: the bicycle is in the back room

quiz_focus: Where does this scene take place?
Who comes to the bicycle shop?
How does Jeroen act when they arrive?
What does Hendrik reveal?
What does Jeroen confess?
Why did Jeroen steal the bicycles?
Where is Sanne's bicycle?
What does Sanne decide to do?
Does Sanne want to help Jeroen or punish him?

resolution.summary: Sanne recovers her bicycle and the neighborhood learns that Jeroen has been stealing bicycles due to financial desperation. Rather than calling the police immediately, Sanne shows compassion and the community decides to help Jeroen find legitimate solutions to his money problems. The bicycle shop stays open with community support.

character_outcomes.sanne_bakker: Gets her bicycle back and shows maturity and compassion. Gains neighborhood respect.
character_outcomes.jeroen_brouwer: Exposed but given a second chance. Must work to rebuild trust.
character_outcomes.hendrik_smit: Vindicated in his suspicions. Respected as neighborhood protector.
character_outcomes.lisa_chen: Her photograph was key evidence. Feels more connected to neighborhood.
character_outcomes.emma_jansen: Central gossip hub - satisfied the mystery is solved.
character_outcomes.femke_janssen: Facilitated communication. Pleased community supported compassion.
character_outcomes.pieter_de_vries: Helped Lisa realize importance of photo. Feels useful.

unlock_locations.unlock_message: You've discovered the bicycle shop! Jeroen's story shows that everyone has struggles.

achievements.name: Detective
achievements.description: Found all clues in the bicycle mystery

achievements.name: Kind Heart
achievements.description: Showed compassion to Jeroen despite his mistakes

meta.difficulty_progression: A1 throughout with gradual vocabulary building
meta.replay_value: medium - linear mystery, satisfaction in resolution

chapter_design_notes.structure_template: Each chapter should have 5-6 scenarios building from inciting incident through rising action to climax and resolution
chapter_design_notes.clue_distribution: Each scenario should contain 3-5 clues of varying importance. Critical clues should appear in dialogue, medium/low importance clues add context.
chapter_design_notes.character_rotation: Use 2-3 characters per scenario. Repeat key characters to maintain thread. Introduce new perspectives.
chapter_design_notes.emotional_arc: Start with problem, build tension and uncertainty, climax with confrontation/revelation, resolve with character growth
chapter_design_notes.language_progression: Maintain A1 level but build vocabulary thematically across chapter. Early scenarios: simpler. Later scenarios: slightly more complex with context support.
chapter_design_notes.location_unlocks: Final scenario should unlock new location that was central to story
chapter_design_notes.affinity_design: Characters who help protagonist gain more affinity. Characters involved in drama gain affinity through resolution.
chapter_design_notes.quiz_philosophy: Questions should test both explicit comprehension and inference. Final scenarios allow deeper questions about motivation and emotion.
